channel.title: Security on Rico's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Security on Rico's Blog

item.title: CVE-2014-8139 and activation-1.1.1.jar
item.description: While rebuilding archiva RPM package, I noticed some openSUSE systems to complains about invalid jar file for activation-1.1.1.jar http://central.maven.org/maven2/javax/activation/activation/1.1.1/activation-1.1.1.jar Unzip indicate an error : unzip -t activation-1.1.1.jar Archive: activation-1.1.1.jar testing: META-INF/ bad extra-field entry: EF block length (0 bytes) invalid (< 4) testing: META-INF/MANIFEST.MF OK Same for zip zip -T activation-1.1.1.jar META-INF/ bad extra-field entry: EF block length (0 bytes) invalid (< 4) test of activation-1.1.1.jar FAILED zip error: Zip file invalid, could not spawn unzip, or wrong unzip (original files unmodified) It seems related to CVE-2014-8139, referenced by RH for example :
